message: Let's start fair.  90/10 split in my favor.  We can adjust if you think it's too much.
I'm not accepting a 90/10 split. I'm willing to give you a 75/25 split, but I think that's still a bit generous on my part.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's try a 65/35 split.  This is fair given the inflation and my rejection of your previous offer.
I'm not willing to give you the majority of the money. I think a 55/45 split is the most I'm willing to offer. I'm starting to think you're not serious about finding a fair deal.
